mapper.select: SELECT p.FG_POST_ID AS postId p.FG_POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT AS postCreatedAt, CASE i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN '확인중' WHEN '1' THEN '답변완료' END AS inquiryStatus FROM FG_POST p, FG_INQUIRY i WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = i.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_USER_CODE = #{userCode} ORDER BY p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC;

SELECT p.FG_POST_TITLE AS postTitle, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME AS businessName, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT AS postCreateAt, i.FG_INQUIRY_CONTENT AS inquiryContent FROM FG_POST p, FG_BUSINESS b, FG_INQUIRY i WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = i.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_USER_CODE = b.FG_USER_CODE AND p.FG_POST_ID = #{postId};

SELECT c.FG_COMMENT_DATE AS commentDate, c.FG_COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, CASE c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT WHEN '0' THEN ' ' WHEN '1' THEN '수정됨' END AS commentEdit FROM FG_POST p, FG_COMMENT c, FG_COMMON_USER cu WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = c.FG_POST_ID AND c.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE AND p.FG_POST_ID = #{postId};
